name: Stop Clock
description:
Simply TAP to Stop the Clock at the correct time!

You’ll have to time your tap to perfection! Sounds easy right? WRONG - It gets VERY tricky.

FEATURES INCLUDE

8 Game Modes:
- Stop Clock
- Tick Tock
- Clock Pop
- Sprint
- Hoppy Clock
- Back in Time
- Time Guess
- Broken Clock

PLUS come back every day to Spin & Win a reward!
Download now 100% FREE!

#StopClock
